snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a robot that changes itself from car to a humanoid and back, continuing growth in the popularity of social media...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a robot that changes itself from car to a humanoid and back, continuing growth in the popularity of social media and a Facebook founder trying to rescue The New Republic.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Expanding Twitter Ads' Reach, and Y Combinator Cuts
